skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Languages and frameworks used include Javascript, React, Node.js, as well as Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Dracula UI for UI/CSS. I love the freedom of expression with React in particular for web development.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Technologies and languages I have used include Python, Java, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server and AstraDB. I have also leveraged SQL and Postman for looking into back-end and API issues.

skills.title: Data Analytics
skills.description: I have used SQL as well as Snowflake and Looker to create queries that were used as views to power merchant-facing dashboards. Data is the heart of any organization and being able to make informed decisions based on accurate data is imperative.

skills.title: Web Applications
skills.description: I have gone through the process of launching websites on AWS, and Netlify. I have also worked with Docker and Kubernetes for containerization. Being able to take a project from inception to a live product feels wonderful as a developer.

portfolio.title: Gothic CRM
portfolio.description: Full Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) functionality with colors that change dynamically upon status updates. Database: AstraDB. Styled with Dracula UI.

portfolio.title: Contacts
portfolio.description: This is a simple Python and React CRUD app with real backend using SQLAlchemy. It allows you to Create Read Update and Delete contacts. Styled with Tailwind CSS.

portfolio.title: Notes App / Todo App
portfolio.description: This is a React Notes app that uses localStorage to save items. This one has been deployed and you can find a link for it on my Github. Styled with Dracula UI.
